title: '64 LHD Panel to Devon + '63 Eriba Puck + Westy Trailer

posts.content:
I need to stop burying me head in the sand with this bus and get it done.. I swear it's all psychological as I desperately want it done but every time I go near it I make an excuse not to work on it.
So I have basically booked some time off next week with the intention of getting it running.. I truly think if I can drive it then I'll be motivated to finish all the bits, install my cool interior, then I'll need a cool trailer so I'll finish that then rear extension called a Puck and all will be good.
If anyone's around this weekend/next week and fancies Helping you would be very welcome!
Peebes is MOT'd Taxed and insured...and I collect tommorrow to drive to my son's wedding ...not as the brides car but for the Eldest and me to drive the youngest son to the church...

Hi Rippers,

Long time no hear, what's happening with the van and the Puck ?

Hope all is well.
I'll be putting an update on my sundial thread tonight.
Lots of woodworking photos to get you inspired

Jason
